post: I would suggest Barcaccia to perform a final test of 018 and deuterium on their samples and check the separation lines outlined in a peer reviewed paper by De Niro et al. Relation between D/H ratios and 18 O/ 16 O ratios in cellulose from linen and maize—Implications for paleoclimatology and sindonology If the linen is from India it would clearly appear so..
